lead_paragraph: Former South Africa captain Graeme Smith said on Saturday an announcement on his rejoining the team in a consulting role to help boost confidence and impart ideas was premature and he was still considering the offer.

headline.print_headline: Smith Yet to Confirm Consulting Role With South Africa Team
headline.main: Smith Yet to Confirm Consulting Role With South Africa Team

snippet: Former South Africa captain Graeme Smith said on Saturday an announcement on his rejoining the team in a consulting role to help boost confidence and impart ideas was premature and he was still considering the offer....
